channel.title: Cooking Recipes on Jay's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Cooking Recipes on Jay's Site

item.title: Hotdogs
item.description: Need some ideas for hotdogs? Here a list from around the nation and other parts of the world. New York Hotdog in a plain white bun Add mustard, sauerkraut and an onion sauce (or just onions) Seattle Bratwurst in a long white bun Add cream cheese, slice jalapenos, chopped cabbage, and sriracha Sonora Bacon wrapped hotdog in a split soft roll Add relish, tomatoes, onions, avocado chunks, nad mayonnaise Tijuana Bacon wrapped hotdog in a soft/squishy white roll Grilled bell peppers, onions, and jalapenos Dodger Footlong dog in a footlong bun Ketchup, mustard, onions, relish Doyer Footlong dog in a footlong bun Add mustard, nacho cheese, pickled jalapenos, and salas Colombia Hotdog in a plain white bun Add ketchup, mustard, mayo, pineapple, crushed potato chips, and a boiled quail egg speared on top Carolina Hotdog in a plain white bun Add chili, chopped onions, and cole slaw Montreal “All-dressed” New England bun Steamed hotdog Add mustard, chopped onions, and cabbage Michigan Hotdog in a plain white bun Add tomato-based meat chili sauce, and mustard Italian Deep fried hotdog Italian roll Add bell peppers, onions, french fries, ketchup, and mustard Coney Short hotdog in a short bun Add chili, chopped onions, and shredded cheddar Chicago Hotdog in a poppy seed bun Add a pickle spear, celery salt, tomatoes, pickled peppers, chopped onions, green relish, and mustard Kansas City Hotdog in a sesame seed bun Add sauerkraut, and melted swiss cheese Brazil Hotdog in a split roll Add pico de gallo, corn, grated parmesan cheese, shredded carrots, diced ham, cilantro, and shoestring fries Chile Hotdog in a plain white bun Add chopped tomatoes, sauerkraut, mashed avocado, and mayo Guatemala Bacon wrapped hotdog on a corn tortilla Smear avocado on the tortilla Add shredded lettuce, cabbage, mayo, and chopped onions Denmark Long hotdog in a normal bun Add pickle chips, remoulade, ketchup, mustard, fried onions, and chopped onions Sweden Hot surrounded by mashed potatoes, shrimp salad, lettuce, fried onions Rolled in a wrap Baltimore Fried bologna wrapped around a fried hotdog in a squishy bun Add mustard Denver Hotdog in a plain white bun Add chopped red onion, green chile sauce, sour cream, and chopped jalapenos Memphis Bacon-wrapped hotdog in a plain white bun Add BBQ sauce, chopped scallions, and shredded cheddar Georgia Open-faced hotdog bun Sliced hotdog Add cheese, chili, chopped onions, sliced pickles, oyster crackers, ketchup and mustard Argentina Chorizo link in a soft hero roll Add chimichurri, tomato mix, and pickled red onion Cleveland Kielbasa in a bun Add french fries, hot sauce, and cole slaw

item.title: Mocha Chocolate Cake
item.description: This thing is the ultimate indulgence. A rich dark chocolate cake with a silky mocha swiss meringue buttercream. Prep Time 2 hours Cook Time 35 minutes Total Time 2 hours 35 minutes Servings 12 Calories 613 kcal I guess? INGREDIENTS Chocolate Cake: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar 3/4 cup Dutch-processed cocoa powder sifted 1 1/2 tsp baking soda 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 1/4 cup vegetable oil 3/4 cup buttermilk 3/4 cup strong brewed coffee hot 2 large eggs 2 tsp vanilla Mocha Buttercream:
